description: Outcome tables for routine activities. Weights determine probability, rewards vary by outcome quality.

excellent: Perfect alignment. The sergeant nods approval.
Sharp drill. Officers took notice.
Crisp movements. Best formation in the company.
good: Solid formation. No complaints.
Good showing. You kept pace well.
Steady drill. The sergeant seemed satisfied.
poor: Sloppy. The sergeant's eye lingered on you.
Out of step. Drew a few looks.
Distracted. Barely kept up.
mishap: Stumbled during drill. Earned extra duty.
Wrong turn. Made the whole line look bad.
Dropped your weapon. The sergeant's face said it all.

excellent: Deck muster sharp as a blade. The ship's master approves.
Perfect formation despite the rolling deck. Impressive showing.
Watch inspection passed with honors. You've found your sea legs.
good: Solid muster on deck. Balance held despite the swell.
Good showing at watch formation. The crew takes notice.
Steady despite the ship's roll. The boatswain nods.
normal: Standard deck muster. Another watch begins.
Inspection passed. The sea routine continues.
Formation on deck completed without incident.
poor: Stumbled on the rolling deck. Drew looks from the crew.
Out of position. The sea's motion threw you off.
Sloppy muster. Should've kept your feet better.
mishap: Lost footing during muster. Slid across the wet deck.
Wrong position. Made the whole watch look foolish.
Dropped your weapon over the rail. The master's fury is legendary.

excellent: Sharp focus today. Movements feel natural.
Everything clicked. A veteran watched approvingly.
Best session in weeks. The muscle memory is building.
good: Solid session. The drills are paying off.
Good practice. You're getting faster.
Strong work. Sword arm feels sure.
poor: Distracted. Sergeant noticed.
Sluggish today. The heat didn't help.
Off rhythm. Need to focus.
mishap: Twisted ankle during drill.
Training partner's swing caught you wrong.
Overextended. Pulled something.

excellent: Deck exercises mastered. Footing sure despite the swell.
Boarding drill went perfectly. The crew watches with respect.
Sharp practice on the rolling deck. Balance and blade work as one.
good: Good training session. Finding your sea legs in combat.
Solid deck drill. The motion's becoming natural.
Practiced well despite the ship's roll. Improving.
normal: Standard deck training. Another day at sea.
Drill completed. The motion still throws you off.
poor: Struggled with the ship's motion. Lost your balance.
Distracted by the sea. The sergeant wasn't pleased.
Off rhythm. The deck's roll ruined your timing.
mishap: Slipped on wet deck during drill. Cracked your knee.
Training partner's swing sent you into the rigging.
Lost footing. Twisted something on the way down.

excellent: Found a forgotten pouch while digging latrines.
Efficient work. Finished early, earned coin.
Good haul. Extra supplies discovered.
good: Honest work done. Muscles ache, but satisfied.
Solid effort. Quota met ahead of time.
Good labor. The quartermaster approved.
poor: Slow progress. Extra hours needed.
Struggled with the work. Exhausted.
Behind quota. Not your best day.
mishap: Dropped a supply crate. Something broke.
Tool slipped. Cut your hand.
Back gave out. Need rest.

excellent: Deck scrubbing finished in record time. The master's pleased.
Rigging work done well. Found loose lines before they failed.
Bilge duty efficient. Discovered smuggled goods. Reward earned.
good: Solid work on the rigging. Hands raw but proud.
Deck work completed well. Salt spray in your eyes the whole time.
Good labor below deck. The ship's running smooth.
normal: Ship maintenance completed. Another day of sea duty.
Deck scrubbed. Water work is never done.
Standard ship's labor. Back aches, hands sting.
poor: Slow work on the rigging. The boatswain's impatient.
Struggled with knots. Should know them better by now.
Behind on deck work. The pitch and roll didn't help.
mishap: Rope burn from the rigging. Hand's blistered badly.
Slipped on wet deck. Barrel rolled over your foot.
Fell from the rigging. Lucky you didn't break bones.

excellent: Good stories around the fire. Spirits high.
Made new friends. The ale flowed freely.
Laughter and camaraderie. Good for the soul.
good: Pleasant evening with comrades.
Shared stories. Good company.
Relaxed time. Bonds strengthened.
normal: Time with the lads. Nothing special.
poor: Kept to yourself. Not feeling social.
Arguments in camp. Tension in the air.
Awkward evening. Better to have stayed away.
mishap: Drinking contest gone wrong. Feeling terrible.
Said the wrong thing. Made enemies.
Fight broke out. You're involved now.

excellent: Sea shanties below deck. Spirits soaring despite the voyage.
Good company and grog. The crew welcomed you in.
Stories of distant ports. Laughter echoes through the hold.
good: Pleasant time with the sailors. Learning their ways.
Shared rum and tales. The crew's warming to you.
Good evening below deck. Sea life has its moments.
normal: Quiet time on deck. Stars above, sea below.
Below deck with the crew. Nothing special.
Standard ship life. Same faces, same stories.
poor: Seasick and miserable. Not fit for company.
Tension below deck. Cramped quarters breed ill will.
Kept to yourself. The ship feels too small.
mishap: Drinking game ended badly. Vomiting over the rail all night.
Insulted a sailor. Made an enemy on a small ship. Unwise.
Brawl below deck. Captain's furious with all involved.

excellent: Sharp dealing. Came out well ahead.
Good trades. Coin purse is heavier.
Shrewd bargaining. Made real profit.
good: Fair trades made. Small profit.
Decent dealing. Nothing lost, something gained.
Good exchange. Worth the time.
poor: Bad deals. Should have walked away.
Cheated by a merchant. Lesson learned.
Lost out on trades. Not your day.
mishap: Gambling debt. Lost more than you should.
Scammed. Purse is lighter.
Dice weren't kind. Significant losses.

excellent: Cards below deck. Sharp play, good winnings.
Traded goods with passing merchant vessel. Profit made.
Shrewd dealing with the crew. Coin purse much heavier.
good: Fair trades with sailors. Small profit.
Decent gambling. Nothing lost, something gained.
Good exchange of goods. Worth the time.
normal: Some trading with crew. Broke even.
poor: Bad bets below deck. Should have stayed away.
Cheated by a sailor. Hard lesson learned.
Lost coin to the crew. Not your day.
mishap: Gambling debt to dangerous men. Trapped on a ship with them.
Scammed badly. Can't escape your creditors at sea.
Dice were loaded. Significant losses. They're laughing.

excellent: Deep, restful sleep. Feel renewed.
Best rest in weeks. Ready for anything.
Woke refreshed. Body and mind restored.
good: Good rest. Feeling better.
Solid sleep. Recovered well.
Decent rest. Ready for tomorrow.
normal: Adequate rest. Morning comes too soon.
poor: Restless night. Noise kept you awake.
Couldn't settle. Mind racing.
Poor sleep. Still tired.
mishap: Nightmares. Woke in cold sweat.
Illness stirring. Stomach troubles.
Couldn't sleep at all. Exhausted.

excellent: Hammock rest with gentle swell. Slept like the dead.
Best sleep at sea yet. The rhythm of the waves soothes.
Woke refreshed. Sea air and steady motion worked wonders.
good: Good rest in the berth. Getting used to the hammock.
Solid sleep despite the ship's motion. Recovered well.
Decent rest below deck. Ready for tomorrow's watch.
normal: Adequate rest. The ship creaks all night.
Sleep came eventually. Hard to adjust to the motion.
Rested. The hammock's not comfortable, but it'll do.
poor: Restless night. The ship's rolling kept you awake.
Couldn't settle in the hammock. Mind won't quiet.
Poor sleep. Seasickness lingering.
mishap: Storm nightmares. Woke to the ship pitching violently.
Seasickness all night. Stomach roiling with the waves.
Couldn't sleep at all. The creaking hull sounds like it's breaking.

excellent: Excellent foraging. Found fresh game and wild vegetables.
Good hunting grounds discovered. Brought back plenty.
Rich pickings today. Supplies significantly boosted.
good: Successful foraging. Decent haul.
Found good resources. Worth the effort.
Productive day in the field.
normal: Standard foraging run. Some supplies gathered.
Returned with what we could find.
poor: Slim pickings. Land is picked over.
Long hours for little result.
Barely found anything. Disappointing.
mishap: Got lost. Returned late and empty-handed.
Injured by thorns. Had to abandon search.
Ran into trouble. Lucky to get back.

excellent: Excellent fishing. Nets bursting with the catch.
Found a school. Brought back more than the ship can salt.
Rich haul from the deep. Supplies significantly boosted.
good: Successful fishing. Decent catch for the mess.
Good fishing grounds found. Worth dropping the nets.
Productive time at the rail. Fresh fish for all.
normal: Standard fishing. Enough for a meal or two.
Caught what we could. Better than hardtack.
poor: Empty nets. The fish aren't biting.
Long hours for a handful of fish.
Barely caught anything. Sea's been fished out here.
mishap: Net tangled. Lost it over the side with the catch.
Hook pierced your hand. Blood in the water.
Nearly pulled overboard. Lost all the gear.

excellent: Sharp patrol. Spotted potential threat early. Reported to command.
Found abandoned supplies on route. Good haul.
Excellent observation. Noticed things others missed.
good: Thorough patrol. Perimeter secure.
Good watchfulness. All clear.
Solid patrol duty. Nothing slipped by.
poor: Distracted on patrol. Sergeant noticed.
Nearly missed a checkpoint. Close call.
Sloppy patrol. Need to stay alert.
mishap: Got turned around. Reported late.
Fell into a ditch. Twisted something.
Almost walked into an ambush. Lucky escape.

excellent: Sharp watch. Spotted distant sails before anyone else. Captain pleased.
Keen eyes on lookout. Saw the reef in time. Saved the ship.
Excellent observation from the crow's nest. Reported threats early.
good: Thorough watch duty. Horizon clear.
Good vigilance. Nothing escaped your notice.
Solid lookout duty. The ship's safe on your watch.
normal: Standard watch. Nothing to report to the master.
poor: Distracted on watch. Nearly missed a signal.
Dozed at your post. The boatswain saw.
Sloppy lookout. Need sharper eyes.
mishap: Fell asleep on watch. Missed approaching vessel. Disciplined.
Lost grip in the rigging. Fell to deck. Lucky to live.
Failed to spot the reef. Ship scraped bottom. Your fault.

excellent: Full day of rest. Completely recovered.
Sergeant granted easy duty. Feel like a new man.
Real rest at last. Ready for anything.
good: Good rest period. Much needed.
Easy day. Body appreciates it.
Light duty. Feeling better.
poor: Rest interrupted. Still tired.
Couldn't fully relax. Worries persist.
Rest period cut short. Not enough.
mishap: Called for duty during rest. Frustrated.
Rest disturbed. Feel worse than before.
No real rest. Something always needed.

excellent: Full day off watch. Slept in the berth, completely recovered.
Master granted easy duty. Sea air and rest did wonders.
Real rest at sea. Feel renewed by the ocean.
good: Good rest period below deck. Much needed break.
Easy day. The sway of the ship soothes.
Light duty. Sea air and rest helping.
normal: Rest period granted. Adequate recovery in the berth.
poor: Rest interrupted by ship's bell. Still tired.
Couldn't relax. The ship's motion unsettles you.
Rest period cut short. Storm brewing, all hands needed.
mishap: Called to emergency during rest. Exhausted and frustrated.
Seasickness during rest. Feel worse than before.
No real rest. Ship's always creaking, crew's always loud.

excellent: Intense drill. Pushed through. Ready for anything.
Emergency readiness achieved. The company is sharp.
Hard training pays off. Reflexes are razor-sharp.
good: Good emergency drill. Readiness improved.
Hard work but worth it. More prepared now.
Solid drill performance. Getting there.
poor: Struggled with the pace. Barely kept up.
Emergency drill was rough. Exhausted.
Not ready. Need more practice.
mishap: Injured during drill. Too intense.
Pushed too hard. Something gave.
Collapsed from exhaustion. Carried back.

excellent: Man overboard drill perfected. Every second counts at sea.
Boarding practice intense. The crew's ready for pirates.
Fire drill flawless. Ship's survival depends on this.
good: Good emergency drill on deck. Readiness improved.
Hard work in rough seas but worth it. More prepared.
Solid drill despite the ship's motion. Getting there.
normal: Emergency drill completed. Standard sea performance.
Extra training on deck. Some improvement.
Drill finished. Adequate for shipboard life.
poor: Struggled with the motion. Barely kept your feet.
Emergency drill rough. Seasickness and exhaustion.
Not ready. Need more practice at sea.
mishap: Injured during boarding drill. Swung wrong on the rope.
Pushed too hard. Fell from rigging during practice.
Collapsed from exhaustion on rolling deck. Dragged below.

excellent: Easy day. Spirits lifted across the company.
Light duty and good company. Morale soaring.
Relaxed atmosphere. The men needed this.
good: Light workload. Appreciated by all.
Easy duties today. Good for morale.
Lighter schedule. Men seem happier.
normal: Not much expected today. Fine with that.
poor: Even light duty felt like a chore.
Still grumbling despite easy work.
Low energy even with light duties.
mishap: Arguments despite easy day. Tensions high.
Light duty interrupted by crisis.
Couldn't enjoy the break. Worries mount.

excellent: Easy watch. Spirits lifted across the crew.
Light duty and calm seas. Morale soaring aboard.
Relaxed day at sea. The sailors needed this.
good: Light workload on deck. The crew appreciates it.
Easy duties today. Good for morale at sea.
Lighter watch rotation. Men seem happier.
normal: Light duty day. Some rest from the rigging.
Easier workload. Welcome change from hard sailing.
Not much expected today. Fine with that.
poor: Even light duty felt wrong. Seasickness lingers.
Still grumbling despite easy watch. Cramped quarters grate.
Low energy despite light duties. The voyage wears on.
mishap: Arguments below deck despite easy day. Cabin fever setting in.
Light duty interrupted by storm. All hands needed.
Couldn't enjoy the break. Ship's taking on water.
